turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm doing good today. How are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thanks for asking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to get a Starbucks espresso beverage today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright what one did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to pick up at the Starbucks on 31st and Dodgen Drive in Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to get an espresso macchiato triple with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Triple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you mean trenta?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would love some. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a trenta macchiato with 2% milk, and whipped cream from the starbucks on 31st and Dogdone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. I appreciate your hard work. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, you have a great day, bye.
